description:
Tapcart is the ultimate mobile commerce platform fueling the fastest growing brands. We power mobile apps for over 50 million consumers worldwide, processing over $6 billion in mobile commerce revenue. Almost all ecommerce traffic comes from a mobile device; we turn these users into high retention growth for some of the largest brands, including BÉIS, Princess Polly, gorjana, LSKD, BYLT Basics, and many more. Tapcart is trusted by thousands of brands to power their mobile experience by building mobile apps in hours (not months).
Tapcart is looking for a strategic Product Manager who can help drive the product roadmap for the thousands of merchants who use Tapcart to reach millions of customers every day. Product Management at Tapcart leads the integration of engineering, data, and design to achieve the company's vision of being the mobile shopping platform for billions of consumers around the globe. In this role, you will develop a keen understanding of how the market is moving and what is relevant to merchants and consumers globally. You’ll work collaboratively to make sure our value prop is clear to any merchant or customer segment and motivates merchants to lean in with Tapcart’s expanding product offering.  This role reports to the VP of Product. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of building value-driving products from custom feedback. You are a metrics-driven pro and can partner effectively across the organization to differentiate our product, drive growth in key business metrics, and evangelize the product vision we see for the business.  While not required, previous experience in eCommerce is a great benefit.  
HOW YOU WILL MAKE AN IMPACT
  • Own your team's products, existing or new, from ideation through development, launch, and maintenance
  • Maintain a deep understanding of how various pieces of a project integrate together - including business logic, data, underlying algorithms, API layers, client-side logic, and user interface components
  • Understand and influence Tapcart's strategic and competitive positions
  • Manage project ambiguity, complexity, and interdependencies in an organized and structured way
  • Based on data analysis, market research, and other studies, set team goals, success metrics, and roadmap to align with Tapcart’s  mission and strategic objectives
  • Effectively manage diverse stakeholder relationships
  • Weigh competing priorities, manage trade-offs, and evaluate opportunistic new ideas with stakeholders, working towards consensus while maintaining a clear focus on overarching business priorities

WHAT SKILLS YOU’LL NEED
  • 5+ years of experience in Product Management 
  • Strong understanding of and direct experience with an technology-focused culture and what it takes to build technical products in an agile+scrum environment
  • Communication and Team Building Skills: You thrive in a dynamic, agile environment leading scrum team members and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills 
  • Creative growth mindset: Ability to think creatively to define new experiences improving adoption, usage, and re-engagement to drive better business outcomes
  • Familiarity and comfort with data, including the ability to use data to analyze and monitor product health, set goals and metrics, as well as aid in the prioritization of initiatives and features
  • Strong analytical and quantitative skills, and the ability to use hard data and metrics to back up assumptions, and recommendations, and take action
  • Detail-oriented, but deftly balanced with holistic system-thinking

BONUS IF YOU HAVE
  • Experience with eComm/Shopify
  • Experience building out CMS’s


This position is not eligible for visa transfer or sponsorship. This position is remote eligible in the following states: AL, AZ, CA, CO, FL, GA, IL, MA, MI, NV, NJ, NY, NC, OH, OR, TN, TX, UT, VA, WA
Tapcart Perks & Benefits ·      401(K) and stock options for all full-time employees ·      Affordable, high quality medical insurance coverage ·      Dental and vision insurance coverage paid 100% for employees ·      Life and disability insurance coverage ·      Flexible PTO and Sick Time ·      11 paid company holidays ·      One-time stipend for outfitting your home office, plus a recurring merchant shopping stipend Who is Tapcart!? We are a growing startup based in Santa Monica, CA 🏖. Our team and culture are very important to us – we aim to make coming to work fun, challenging and rewarding. We know that doing impactful work means showing up with creative solutions for our merchants and our business. We strive to make Tapcart a place where passionate, talented people can grow their skills and careers.  Read about our Series B fundraise for $50M in June 2021. We raised our Series A for $10M in May 2020. Check out what our customers are saying.  Learn more about who we are and what we offer on our Careers page.

This position is eligible for bonus.
